casebody.data:
State
v.
Ronnie Paul Godbey 443PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Godbey, Ronnie Paul. Anita LeVeaux, Assistant Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Southport.

Amy Bircher, Assistant Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of December 2016 by State of NC to Amend Response to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
